This app was made in honor of the first game I created as a developer. Just like the name implies, it is a guessing game where you have to guess the color chosen by the app.


Created by Parfait Mwamba in 2017.

Feel free to check out my other (future) apps! 

parfait.dev@gmail.com

This is very simple.

In order to begin a game, you must select either New Game or Continue from the main page.

This will take you to the game page where you will be prompted to "Choose a color". That color represents a guess that you will be making.

You have 3 tries for every life. This is a game between the program and yourself.

Try to be Victorious!
